predictions.text: U.S. PCE Core (MoM, SA) for September 2025 will print between 0.20% and 0.30% in the BEA release due by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BEA's 'Personal Income and Outlays' release: 'PCE price index excluding food and energy, percent change from preceding month' for September 2025.
predictions.rationale: Recent CPI/PPI suggest sticky 0.2–0.3% core trend; services disinflation slow but goods not reaccelerating sharply.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 1-year inflation expectations (final) for October 2025 will print between 3.0% and 3.6%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers final October 2025 report: 'Expected change in prices during the next year.'
monitoring_signals: News on tariffs and consumer price pressures
predictions.rationale: Gas prices have eased modestly; preliminary readings and breakevens point to mid-3% range.

predictions.text: The PBOC will keep the 1-year Loan Prime Rate unchanged at 3.35% at the fixing on or before 2025-10-21.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via PBOC/National Interbank Funding Center official LPR announcement showing 1-year LPR = 3.35% at the next fixing date.
predictions.rationale: With the MLF rate steady and FX sensitivity elevated, pass-through to LPR is unlikely near-term.

predictions.text: Euro area HCOB Manufacturing PMI (final) for October 2025 will print between 47.0 and 49.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in S&P Global/HCOB final Eurozone Manufacturing PMI press release for October 2025.
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains in mild contraction; flash prints and new orders suggest sub-50 but improving.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Los Angeles weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-11-30 will be at least 20% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Shanghai–Los Angeles spot rate from the 2025-09-05 report to any subsequent weekly print up to 2025-11-30; increase ≥20%.
predictions.rationale: Escalating trade controls and capacity management likely lift Transpacific spot rates.

predictions.text: ICE BofA U.S. High Yield Index Option-Adjusted Spread (FRED: BAMLH0A0HYM2) will close at or above 4.50% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify on FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2 daily close at or above 4.50% by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Tighter financial conditions and event risks could spark a temporary risk-off widening.

predictions.text: Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey 30-year fixed rate will print at or below 6.50% in at least one weekly release by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in Freddie Mac PMMS weekly report that the U.S. 30-year fixed-rate mortgage average is ≤6.50% in at least one week.
predictions.rationale: Stabilizing inflation and lower term premium would feed through to mortgage rates with a lag.

predictions.text: COMEX Gold futures (GC, most-active) will settle at or above $2,650 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check CME Group daily settlement for the most-active COMEX Gold (GC) contract; any settlement ≥$2,650/oz before deadline.
predictions.rationale: Geopolitical risk and easing real yields could briefly propel gold to new highs.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or below 148.50 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify intraday low on Yahoo Finance JPY=X at or below 148.50 on any UTC day by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Intervention risk is elevated; a risk-off spike or official action could push a brief sub-149 print.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-16 close to 2025-11-30 close, Energy Select Sector SPDR (XLE) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 2.5 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-10-16 to 2025-11-30 for XLE and SPY (Yahoo Finance). XLE minus SPY ≥ +2.5 pp.
predictions.rationale: Oil-sensitive equities benefit from tight balances and rising cash returns amid possible value rotation.

predictions.text: China PPI (headline, YoY) for October 2025 will print between -2.5% and -1.0% in the National Bureau of Statistics release by 2025-11-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in NBS monthly price release the Industrial Producer Price Index (YoY) for October 2025.
predictions.rationale: Weak domestic demand and excess capacity keep producer prices in deflation, though narrowing from lows.

predictions.text: The Brent–WTI front-month settlement spread will reach at or above $7.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: On any day before the deadline, subtract NYMEX WTI front-month settlement from ICE Brent front-month settlement; if ≥$7.00, condition met.
predictions.rationale: Geopolitical risk premia and U.S. inland dynamics can widen the transatlantic spread episodically.
